statements: SELECT * FROM TripCosts WHERE cost > 1000
SELECT package_name, cost, revenue FROM TripCosts WHERE profitability > 0.5 ORDER BY package_name DESC
SELECT trip_id, package_name FROM TripCosts WHERE revenue < cost ORDER BY cost ASC, trip_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT package_name FROM TripCosts
SELECT AVG(cost) AS avg_cost, MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue FROM TripCosts WHERE cost < 500
SELECT trip_id, package_name, cost, revenue, profitability FROM TripCosts WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT package_name, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM TripCosts GROUP BY package_name HAVING total_cost > 5000
SELECT * FROM TripCosts WHERE package_name LIKE '%Honeymoon%'
SELECT AVG(profitability) AS avg_profit FROM TripCosts WHERE revenue > 500
SELECT MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue, MIN(cost) AS min_cost FROM TripCosts
SELECT * FROM trip_cost ORDER BY trip_id DESC;
SELECT location, total_cost FROM trip_cost WHERE cost_per_person > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT trip_id, location, total_cost FROM trip_cost WHERE cost_per_person < 50 AND total_cost < 500 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM trip_cost WHERE location like 'New%' ORDER BY cost_per_person ASC;
SELECT trip_id, location, cost_per_person, total_cost FROM trip_cost WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost_per_person DESC;
SELECT location, total_cost FROM trip_cost WHERE cost_per_person > 50 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT trip_id, location, cost_per_person FROM trip_cost WHERE total_cost < 1000;
SELECT trip_id, income, profit FROM revenue_analysis WHERE expenses < income AND profit > 500;
SELECT location, total_cost, cost_per_person FROM trip_cost WHERE total_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT trip_id, total_cost FROM trip_cost WHERE location LIKE 'New York%';
SELECT * FROM trips;
SELECT trip_id, trip_name FROM trips WHERE package_price > 1000;
SELECT trip_name, package_price FROM trips ORDER BY package_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenues WHERE revenue_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT trip_name, cost_of_trip FROM trips JOIN profitability ON trips.trip_id = profitability.trip_id;
SELECT * FROM trips;
SELECT trip_name, package_price FROM trips WHERE package_price > 1000 ORDER BY trip_name DESC;
SELECT trip_name, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM trips JOIN revenues ON trips.trip_id = revenues.trip_id GROUP BY trip_name HAVING total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;

SELECT t.trip_name, r.revenue_amount, p.cost_of_trip FROM trips t JOIN revenues r ON t.trip_id = r.trip_id JOIN profitability p ON t.trip_id = p.trip_id WHERE p.cost_of_trip < r.revenue_amount ORDER BY r.revenue_amount DESC, p.cost_of_trip ASC;

SELECT t.trip_name, COUNT(r.revenue_id) AS revenue_count, AVG(p.cost_of_trip) AS avg_cost FROM trips t LEFT JOIN revenues r ON t.trip_id = r.trip_id LEFT JOIN profitability p ON t.trip_id = p.trip_id GROUP BY t.trip_name HAVING revenue_count > 2 ORDER BY avg_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE destination='Paris';
SELECT trip_id, trip_name, start_date, end_date FROM trips;
SELECT trip_name, destination, start_date, end_date FROM trips ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT trip_name, expense_type, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM revenues WHERE revenue_type='Ticket Sales' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT trip_name, destination, start_date, end_date FROM trips;
SELECT trip_name, start_date, end_date, destination FROM trips ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_type ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT trip_id, trip_name, destination FROM trips WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trip_name, SUM(amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenues GROUP BY trip_name HAVING total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM trip_costs ORDER BY trip_date ASC;
SELECT trip_name, cost FROM trip_costs WHERE cost > 500;
SELECT trip_name, cost, trip_date FROM trip_costs WHERE trip_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM trip_costs;
SELECT * FROM travel_packages WHERE package_price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY package_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM trip_costs;
SELECT trip_name, cost FROM trip_costs WHERE trip_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT trip_name, cost FROM trip_costs ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT trip_name, cost, revenue_amount FROM trip_costs JOIN revenue_analysis ON trip_costs.trip_id = revenue_analysis.trip_id;
SELECT package_name, package_price FROM travel_packages WHERE package_price > 500;
